Contributing

Source: .github/CONTRIBUTING.md

We welcome contributions to the plumber package!

To submit a contribution:

  1. Fork the repository and make your changes.

  2. Submit a pull request.

  3. Ensure that you have signed the contributor license agreement. It will appear as a “Check” on your PR and a comment from “CLAassistant” will also appear explaining whether you have yet to sign. After you sign, you can click the “Recheck” link in that comment and the check will flip to reflect that you’ve signed.

Developed by Barret Schloerke, Jeff Allen, .

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
